@Irwinner21 wrote:

NPCHandler.java:233: illegal start of expression
public boolean IsInWorldMap(int coordX, int coordY) {
^
1 error
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .
Getting that error, I know itâ€™s nooby, but what should it look likeâ€¦ It looks like this.

[code]public boolean IsInWorldMap(int coordX, int coordY) {
	for (int i = 0; i < worldmap[0].length; i++) {
		//if (worldmap[0][i] == coordX && worldmap[1][i] == coordY) {
			return true;
		//}
	}
	return false;
}
